decimal-> binário

	256	128	64	32	16	8	4	2	1

137=	0	1	0	0	0	1	0	0	1
228=
104=
265=
73=
84=

binário -> decimal

		256	128	64	32	16	8	4	2	1

1011101=			1	0	1	1	1	0	1	=93
1010111=			1	0	1	0	1	1	1	=87
1101001=			1	1	0	1	0	0	1	=105
11111001=		1	1	1	1	1	0	0	1	=249
10000110=		1	0	0	0	0	1	1	0	=134
10001000=		1	0	0	0	1	0	0	0	=136

decimal -> hexadecimal

	256	16	1

1024=	4	0	0	=400
1123=	4	6	3	=463
2041=	7	14	9	=7F9
2340=	9	2	4	=924
2320=	9	1	0	=910
2531=	9	14	3	=9f3

hexadecimal -> binário

	8421 8421 8421 8421 8421

f38=	1111 0011 10 
abf=	1010 1011 11
f3c=	1111 0011 11
4fb=	0100 1111 1011
dd8=	1101 1101 1000
cc3=	1100 1100 0011
bca=	1011 1100 1010

binário -> hexadecimal 

8421 8421 8421 8421 8421

          1011 1001 1101 = 11 9 13 = b9d
  10 1101 0001 1110 1111 = 2 13 1 14 15 = 2d1ef 
        1 0110 1111 0011 = 1 6 15 3 = 16f3
      110 0111 1001 1000 = 6 7 9 8 = 6789
   1 0101 0101 0100 0011 = 1 5 5 4 3 = 15543
      111 1100 0110 0011 = 7 12 6 3 = 7c63
